Pre-Game Insights: The Phoenix Suns are looking to halt their three-game losing streak as they face the Indiana Pacers.The Pacers are strong at home with an 8-6 record, while the Suns are struggling away with a 5-9 record.Pascal Siakam and Kevin Durant are key players to watch, with Siakam averaging 19.8 points and Durant scoring 27.7 per game.The Pacers have a higher shooting percentage (48.8%) compared to the Suns' allowed field goal percentage (46.8%).The Suns make 14.3 three-pointers per game, while the Pacers allow 15.7 per game.
